title: Running League on MacBook Pro 2011
body: I am a fairly casual gamer although I have noticed my mac is running league around a 20 fps average which makes the game nearly unplayable. Is or was anyone else in my situation and can tell me how to boost my fps? I deleted nearly all my files and changed all of the video settings to the lowest quality. Thank you

replies.body: You might have some luck by running a quick repair through the client options, but go ahead and check up on the steps in this [**Mac FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684#section-mac) and let me know if that's able to help at all.
